mapper.sql: ci.ID, ci.USER_ID, ci.OUT_ID, ci.ACCOUNT, ci.DRAW_MONEY, ci.NO_DRAW_MONEY, ci.CUR_NOWORKDAY_ID, ci.CAL_INTEREST_DAY, ci.ACTUAL_MONEY, ci.ACTUAL_DRAW_MONEY, ci.ACTUAL_NO_DRAW_MONEY, ci.TENDER_TYPE, ci.ADDUSER, ci.ADDTIME, ci.ADDIP, ci.STATUS, ci.PLATFORM, ci.REMARK
mapper.select:
select m.username as username, from t_cur_in ci, rocky_member m where ci.`STATUS` = 0 and m.id = ci.user_id and ci.CAL_INTEREST_DAY <> ifnull(( IFNULL(( SELECT date_add(END_DATE, interval 2 day) FROM t_cur_noworkday WHERE START_DATE <= date(ci.ADDTIME) AND END_DATE >= date(ci.ADDTIME) ),( IFNULL(( select date_add(END_DATE, interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) from t_cur_noworkday where START_DATE <= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval 1 day) and END_DATE >= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval 1 day) ),( select date_add(END_DATE, interval 1 day) from t_cur_noworkday where START_DATE <= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) and END_DATE >= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) ) )) )) , date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) )
and m.username = trim(#{username})

select count(ci.id) from t_cur_in ci, rocky_member m where ci.`STATUS` = 0 and m.id = ci.user_id and ci.CAL_INTEREST_DAY <> ifnull(( IFNULL(( SELECT date_add(END_DATE, interval 2 day) FROM t_cur_noworkday WHERE START_DATE <= date(ci.ADDTIME) AND END_DATE >= date(ci.ADDTIME) ),( IFNULL(( select date_add(END_DATE, interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) from t_cur_noworkday where START_DATE <= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval 1 day) and END_DATE >= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval 1 day) ),( select date_add(END_DATE, interval 1 day) from t_cur_noworkday where START_DATE <= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) and END_DATE >= date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) ) )) )) , date_add(date(ci.ADDTIME), interval if(hour(ci.ADDTIME) < 15, 1, 2) day) )
and m.username = trim(#{username})
